mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie(movieCd, movieTitle, movieTitleEn, movieGenre, movieTime, movieGrade, movieDate, movieDirector, movieActors, movieInfo, moviePosterUrl, movieReservationRate, movieTotalAudience, movieStatus) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{movieTitle}, #{movieTitleEn}, #{movieGenre}, #{movieTime}, #{movieGrade}, #{movieDate}, #{movieDirector}, #{movieActors}, #{movieInfo}, #{moviePosterUrl}, #{movieReservationRate}, #{movieTotalAudience}, #{movieStatus})
